sys_openapi_operation.name: Get options for field

openapi.display_value: The Jira Cloud platform REST API - 1001.0.0-SNAPSHOT

sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Get options for field","fOperationId":"getOptionsForField","fDescription":"This operation is deprecated and becomes unavailable on 8 May 2021. Use [Get custom field options (context)](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/rest/v3/api-group-issue-custom-field-options/#api-rest-api-3-field-fieldid-context-contextid-option-get) instead. See [Deprecation of custom field options](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-removal-of-custom-field-options-operations/) for details.

Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of options and, where the custom select field is of the type *Select List (cascading)*, cascading options for custom select fields. Cascading options are included in the item count when determining pagination. Only options from the global context are returned.

Note that this operation **only works for issue field select list options created in Jira or using operations from the [Issue custom field options](#api-group-Issue-custom-field-options) resource**, it cannot be used with issue field select list options created by Connect apps.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).","fPath":"/rest/api/2/customField/{fieldId}/option","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":true,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Returned if the request is successful.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson6864896221","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/PageBeanCustomFieldOptionDetails","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Returned if the request is invalid.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"401","fDescription":"Returned if the authentication credentials are incorrect or missing.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Returned if the field is not found.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"fieldId","fDescription":"The ID of the custom field. Note: This is the numeric part of the of the field ID. For example, for a field with the ID *customfield\_10075* use *10075*.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"fieldId2477273885","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"int64","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}}]},{"fName":"startAt","fDescription":"The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"startAt2423173725","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"int64","fDefault":0,"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}}]},{"fName":"maxResults","fDescription":"The maximum number of items to return per page.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"maxResults7034091242","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"int32","fDefault":1000,"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}}]}]}

options for field</name><openapi display_value="The Jira Cloud platform REST API - 1001.0.0-SNAPSHOT">a629c6231b9b28108b08419ead4bcb53</openapi><path>/rest/api/2/customField/{fieldId}/option</path><serialized_operation>{"fName":"Get options for field","fOperationId":"getOptionsForField","fDescription":"This operation is deprecated and becomes unavailable on 8 May 2021. Use [Get custom field options (context)](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/rest/v3/api-group-issue-custom-field-options/#api-rest-api-3-field-fieldid-context-contextid-option-get) instead. See [Deprecation of custom field options](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-removal-of-custom-field-options-operations/) for details.

Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of options and, where the custom select field is of the type *Select List (cascading)*, cascading options for custom select fields. Cascading options are included in the item count when determining pagination. Only options from the global context are returned.

Note that this operation **only works for issue field select list options created in Jira or using operations from the [Issue custom field options](#api-group-Issue-custom-field-options) resource**, it cannot be used with issue field select list options created by Connect apps.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).","fPath":"/rest/api/2/customField/{fieldId}/option","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":true,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Returned if the request is successful.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson6864896221","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/PageBeanCustomFieldOptionDetails","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Returned if the request is invalid.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"401","fDescription":"Returned if the authentication credentials are incorrect or missing.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Returned if the field is not found.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"fieldId","fDescription":"The ID of the custom field. Note: This is the numeric part of the of the field ID. For example, for a field with the ID *customfield\_10075* use *10075*.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"fieldId2477273885","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"int64","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}}]},{"fName":"startAt","fDescription":"The
